price: 85. Lalu mereka berkata, “Kepada Allah-lah kami bertawakal. Ya Tuhan kami, janganlah Engkau jadikan kami (sasaran) fitnah bagi kaum yang zalim,
arabic: فَقَالُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوَكَّلۡنَا رَبَّنَا لَا تَجۡعَلۡنَا فِتۡنَةٗ لِّلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: faqālū ʿalā al-lahi tawakkalnā rabbanā lā tajʿalnā fit'natan lil'qawmi al-ẓālimīna
